line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups boiling chicken broth
1/2 cup uncooked long grain rice
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1/2 cup uncooked long grain rice")

line.originaltext: 1/4 teaspoon Italian seasoning
1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese
1 (2.8 ounce) can French-fried onions, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "1 (2.8 ounce) can French-fried onions, divided")

line.originaltext: 1 pound fresh or frozen fish fillets, thawed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing7, "1 pound fresh or frozen fish fillets, thawed")

line.originaltext: 1 dash paprika
1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
In a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "11 in x 7 in x 2 in baking dish")

line.originaltext: In a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
In a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing10, "broth and rice", "")

line.originaltext: In a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
Cover and bake at 375 degrees F for 10 minutes.
Cover and bake at 375 degrees F for 10 minutes.
Cover and bake at 375 degrees F for 10 minutes.
Cover and bake at 375 degrees F for 10 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing10, t1, ing11, "cooked broth and rice", "10 minutes")

line.originaltext: Add the broccoli, Parmesan cheese and half of the onions.
Add the broccoli, Parmesan cheese and half of the onions.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing12, ing4, ing5}, ing14, "broth, rice, broccoli", "")

line.originaltext: Top with fish fillets; sprinkle with paprika.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing7}, ing15, "fish fillets with rice", "top with fish fillets")

line.originaltext: Top with fish fillets; sprinkle with paprika.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing8}, ing16, "fish fillets", "sprinkle with paprika")

line.originaltext: Cover and bake 20-25 minutes longer or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Cover and bake 20-25 minutes longer or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t1, ing17, "baked fish fillets", "20-25 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork")

line.originaltext: Uncover; sprinkle with cheddar cheese and remaining onions.
Uncover; sprinkle with cheddar cheese and remaining onions.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing17, ing9}, ing18, "fish fillets topped with cheese", "sprinkle with cheddar cheese and onions")

line.originaltext: Return to the oven for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: cook(ing18, t1, ing19, "baked fish and rice", "3 minutes or until cheese is melted")
